overview: Vilde (12) wants to be the first female 'Halling' folk dance champion. A traditional dance for men only. Her greatest challenge isn't the competition - she's convinced that her strength and passion for dance and life are helping her beloved grandfather to win his fight against cancer.
tagline: Vilde is training to become Norway's best solo dancer in the macho folkdance halling but what is most important now is the love for her grandfather
title: Dancing for You
